rules_text: [i]Converge[/i] – Exile up to X nonland permanents you control, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Reenter Orbit, then return them to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: [i]As her shuttle hurtled back towards her home, Lieutenant Saxon looked at all the empty seats alongside her. “Everyone I know goes away, in the end,” she muttered.[/i]
notes:
Hurt — Johnny Cash (Not Nine Inch Nails)
!done
